item.title: In This Wet Place
item.description: Album cover designed for the latest Orchid Lodge album In This Wet Place , inspired by 80’s and 90’s 4AD releases. Orchid Lodge - In This Wet Place album cover I also designed a cassette sleeve variant of this for a short-run self-published tape of the album. Front of the cassette case and sleeve Back of the cassette case and sleeve Cassette and case Outside of the sleeve Inside of the sleeve with additional text Cassette with pad print
